titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of February 28, 2024, as Community Arts Education Day.
Expressing support for the designation of February 28, 2024, as Community Arts Education Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution supports Community Arts Education Day and recognizes that day as more crucial than ever as a vehicle for activism, individual and collective self-expression, and healing.
